video.title: All Hail King Julien
video.synopsis: In this Emmy winner for Outstanding Children's Animated Program, Madagascar booty-shaker King Julien takes on the jungle’s craziest adventures.

episodes.synopsis: Uncle King Julien abdicates his throne, handing off his crown to Prince Julien. Let the reign of King Julien the Thirteenth begin!
episodes.title: King Me

episodes.synopsis: King Julien learns that 99% of the lemurs love him, so he makes it his mission to find and convert his one "hater."
episodes.title: Poll Position

episodes.synopsis: The evil genius Karl sets out to destroy King Julien. When both Clover and Maurice are captured, King Julien must save them from his new nemesis.
episodes.title: Enter the Fanaloka

episodes.synopsis: Exhausted from settling his subjects' disputes, King Julien replaces himself with a dummy king so he can play hooky, unwittingly sparking a rebellion.
episodes.title: Empty Is the Head

episodes.synopsis: Set on reclaiming his throne, Uncle King Julien convinces Julien to go into Foosa territory. Julien creates a disguise and forces Maurice to join him.
episodes.title: Return of the Uncle King

episodes.synopsis: Clover is forced to take a vacation, and while she's away, she meets the handsome and free-spirited Sage Moondancer.
episodes.title: Eat Prey Shove

episodes.synopsis: Julien teams up with Timo the tenrec, a scientist who the king enlists to automate everything in the kingdom.
episodes.title: He Blinded Me With Science

episodes.synopsis: When Julien embarrasses Maurice, he tries to make up for his transgression, while Mort inadvertently joins an anti-King Julien group.
episodes.title: Viva Mort

episodes.synopsis: Julien concocts an elaborate lie, blaming a giant "mega-gecko" for ruining a young lemur's birthday party.
episodes.title: The Really Really Big Lie

episodes.synopsis: Julien finds a bag of coffee beans in the Cove of Wonders and gets the entire lemur community hooked on caffeine.
episodes.title: One More Cup

episodes.synopsis: King Julien has a brilliant idea: He'll tame a Foosa and train it to keep peace in his kingdom. But the plan doesn't go quite as expected.
episodes.title: My Fair Foosa

episodes.synopsis: Julien sparks a fashion frenzy when he turns a box of diapers into the coolest styles the kingdom has ever seen.
episodes.title: Diapers Are The New Black

episodes.synopsis: It's love at first sight when Julien meets Clover's party-girl sister, Crimson. Could the king have found his queen?
episodes.title: Crimson and Clover

episodes.synopsis: When Julien is fooled into believing that a "divine pineapple" contains the wisdom of former kings, a jealous Mort tries to get rid of it.
episodes.title: Pineapple Of My Eye

episodes.synopsis: Fascinated by the idea of money, King Julien brings cash to the kingdom. But Mort's surprising money skills create big problems.
episodes.title: Gimme Gimme Gimme: The Game

episodes.synopsis: When King Julien's body double is injured on a waterslide, it's up to Magic Steve to hold peace talks with the cranky crocodiles.
episodes.title: Body Double

episodes.synopsis: Julien rescues a charming old lemur named Doc Sugarfoot from a cave and takes him on as an adviser.
episodes.title: Election

episodes.synopsis: Thinking Mort is his son, Julien renames him Falcon and enters him in the Junior Gent pageant. Little does he know the lemur's true age.
episodes.title: Daddy Julien

episodes.synopsis: Rob, Julien's former best friend and partner in the rap duo "Lemurs Love the Lemur Ladies," shows up to lure the king back to his wild partying ways.
episodes.title: That's Sooo Rob

episodes.synopsis: Julien gives up his kingdom to help a fellow royal in distress, only to discover he's been tricked by two old enemies.
episodes.title: The Man in The Iron Booty

episodes.synopsis: After setting out to claim the moon for all lemurkind, King Julien comes face-to-face with Stanislav, the Russian Space Monkey.
episodes.title: Monkey Planet

episodes.synopsis: When Julien discovers Maurice is moonlighting as an adviser to Rat King Joey, the best friends break up and ask the divine pineapple for advice.
episodes.title: True Bromance

episodes.synopsis: While writing Julien's life story, Clover makes up a tall tale about a baby-eating giant scorpion named Fred. The real Fred reads it and vows revenge.
episodes.title: The King Who Would Be King

episodes.synopsis: After Frank the Sky God demands that the lemurs sacrifice King Julien, Julien creates his own deity: Larry the Volcano God.
episodes.title: Are You There, Frank? It's Me, King Julien

episodes.synopsis: Julien's dream of opening a nightclub finally comes true, but the place is haunted by a masked phantom. Or could it be someone making mischief?
episodes.title: The Phantom of Club Moist

episodes.synopsis: Julien is diagnosed with Mad Horse Disease but refuses to give up the throne to his uncle without a fight … or maybe a steeplechase.
episodes.title: King Juli-END?
